title: Oblong Plaque with Figure of a Cow
description:
Oblong alabaster plaque with figure of a cow lightly incised on face. Relief originally filled in with dark brown substance some of which remains in place. Probably connected with Hathor.

Purpose of object not evident; similar plaques have been found in foundation deposits. Also known as votive offerings.

Condition: Good, edges chipped, surface stained.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
